body:
Hey all, It’s Wednesday!

Today we are announcing 3 new morphs!

We are announcing the Squid, Rabbit, and Magma Cube morphs! The Magma Cube morph can only be purchased by Emerald and Diamond users, but, the other two can be purchased by everyone! These morphs can also be earned from the voting rewards crate, and are possible in the Beta/Gamma crates. 

See you Friday,
ALM (and the lovely Junior Developers)

title: [10/04/2017] More Morphs

replies.body:
What's the point of Morphs when you can't even walk 10 blocks without being teleported back to the spawn?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T2gWZNcVopU
replies.body_tagged:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T2gWZNcVopU

replies.body:
I think you brought this up last time when they added new morphs too. Totally agree

There's no point in coming out with new things if you have issues that prevent the things from really even working. Fix the issues first?
